mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_nm, user_pwd, user_addr, user_contact) values (#{userId}, #{name}, #{password}, #{address}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select user_id as userId, user_nm as name, user_pwd as password, user_addr as address, user_contact as phone from user
select user_id as userId, user_nm as name, user_pwd as password, user_addr as address, user_contact as phone from user where user_id like concat('%',#{keyId}, '%')
